name: True Ending (CZ)
description:
(Game is Czech Only!)

Takeshi is an average high schooler with average high school problems. Even though he is such an example of averageness, he wasn’t able to form a connection with his classmates. All that is destined to change when he steps on the school's rooftop for the first time...

THAT’S NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL! Demon Kurotetsu trapped us here and I don’t know how to get us back! HEY, SOMEONE, ANYONE, SAVE US! This is not a joke!

... Kurotetsu is a great guy!

Screenplay: Ondřej Sýkora, Emil Gašparec

Programming: Emil Gašparec

Graphics: Jana Kilianová

Music: Craig Austin, Craig Riley

Proofreading: Veronika Bobková

Number of words: 40 855

Original release date: 7.3.2015

(Uploaded for Archiving Purposes)
